programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac -+rtmidi=virtual -M0 ;;;realtime audio out and realtime midi in ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if realtime audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o transegr.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
icps cpsmidi iamp ampmidi .2 ; st,dur1,typ1,val,dur2,typ2,end kenv transegr 0, .2, 2, .5, 1, - 3, 0 asig pluck kenv*iamp, icps, icps, 1, 1 outs asig, asig
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> f1 0 4096 10 1 ;sine
f0 30 ;runs 30 seconds e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
